maltcms.datastructures.caches
Interface IScanLine

All Superinterfaces:
IConfigurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AScanLineCache, CachedScanLineList, ScanLineCache, SparseScanLineCache
public interface IScanLine
extends IConfigurable

Interface for all scan line data holder.

Author:
Mathias Wilhelm(mwilhelm A T TechFak.Uni-Bielefeld.DE)

getMassSpectra

Array getMassSpectra(int x,
                     int y)
Getter for one mass spectra. If the requested mass spectra is out of bound, then this method will return null.

Parameters:
x - scanline number
y - mass spectra inside this scanline
Returns:
array representing one mass spectra

getScanlineMS

java.util.List<Array> getScanlineMS(int x)
This method will create a List of Array containing the mass spectra of scanline x. All this mass spectra are normalized to one size.

Parameters:
x - scan line number
Returns:
list of mass spectra

getScanlineSparseMS

setCacheModulations

void setCacheModulations(boolean cacheMod)
Setter. Default value is true.

Parameters:
cacheMod - true if all modulations should be cached
